BR_text.BRsummary: Docs should indicate that "magic" doesn't work in imported files
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-link:https://streamlit.io/docs/api.html#magic-commands>The magic docs</denchmark-link>
  should indicate that magic doesn't work for imported files.
 <denchmark-h:h2>Note</denchmark-h>
 
 Eventually, we'd like to fix <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues/288>the underlying bug</denchmark-link>
  itself.
